column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I came here alone
column3: because of the FREE ADMISSION now until February. The first time
column4: I marveled at the older stuff-- it is overplayed
column6: but Seurat's Sunday Afternoon... is breathtaking up close. It is literally a HUGE work of art. The second time
column7: I checked out the modern wing
column8: laughed at some of the ridiculous things the brilliant/crazy come up with
